item.title: Git Submodules
item.description: Table of Contents Starting off What are they good for? Codebase isolation Codebase stability Sane Git histories Sane codebase mental models Working with submodules Configure Git Submodule Visibility Update Submodule Submodule Metadata Submodule Refs Further Reading Here be dragons In Chuck Palahniuk’s words, "You must jump into disaster with both feet." Git submodules are generally avoided because: They tend to be poorly understood, and
